section.title: Tracers
section.para: The example Application uses multiple JAIN SLEE 1.1 Tracer facility instances. Below is full list:

row.entry: javax.slee.SbbNotification[service= ServiceID[ name= MsControlDemo ,vendor=org.restcomm, version=1.0], sbb=SbbID[name=CallSbb, vendor=restcomm, version=1.0]]. SubscriptionProfileSbb

important.para: Spaces where introduced in LOG4J category column values, to correctly render the table. Please remove them when using copy/paste.

section.title: Alarms
section.para: The example Application does not set JAIN SLEE Alarms.
